title: Best of the Program | Guest: James O’Keefe | 1/24/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show with a monologue remembering the 1970s and how we’re still cleaning up the mess that was started back then. Project Veritas founder and CEO James O’Keefe joins to discuss his new book, “American Muckraker: Rethinking Journalism for the 21st Century.” Mainstream Democrats are waking up to the COVID scare and the negative effects it’s having on society.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
